overview: Saket Misra is the Vice President of Operations for Navatar Group customers, providing Risk Management and is based in Navatar’s Technical Excellence Center in New Delhi. Saket has extensive experience in the strategic use of CRM, information systems, software design and managing operations and service delivery in high growth technology companies. He has built marketing and sales operations, high performance teams, service delivery processes and back office infrastructure for several international organizations. He also serves on the Board of the United Way of Delhi.
